metadata.synopsis: One liner AD dialog that all beggar zombies say to showcase how they are vomiting to remove their respective canopy jars from their insides.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to Thrumbo and reveal the existance of the canopy jars, making them go to one corner and throw up.Location: BGO_Main_A: 40; 1; 86

0.context: NodeContext: Vomiting noise (throwing up an entire canopic jar)
